title: Power - three resistors R0 with different currents

content.question: A battery and three resistors are connected in a circuit, as shown in the figure. The currents in and resistances of the resistors are as indicated. What is the power output of the battery?

choices.label: <math alttext="2 I sub 0, end sub, squared, times R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msubsup><mi>I</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="3 I sub 0, end sub, squared, times R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><msubsup><mi>I</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="4 I sub 0, end sub, squared, times R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><msubsup><mi>I</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="6 I sub 0, end sub, squared, times R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6</mn><msubsup><mi>I</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="6 I sub 0, end sub, squared, times R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6</mn><msubsup><mi>I</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
